name: Monster Project
about: It is a tamagotchi-like browser game where you can feed a monster, so it doesnâ€™t die.
notes: I enjoy playing darts and video games myself, and this game I created with my teammates at Hyper Island. I enjoy working both in a team and individually, and I value trust and open-mindedness.

name: Phonebook
about: For example, for this Phonebook project I grabbed the colors from the image that I liked and then implemented them in the layout. Here you can add name and phone number to the phonebook, search through them, and delete them.
notes: But I also enjoy creating  UI of different styles and colors.

name: To Do List
about: It all started with this project, a To Do List, where you can add and delete tasks and lists, mark tasks as important and completed. All data is stored in Local Storage.
notes: You probably noticed that I love neon colors and dark themes.

name: Music Box
about: Like this app, where you can search for music. Here I use Genius API to search for songs and show the result. I like solving complex problems and challenging tasks, as I believe that helps my professional growth.
notes: And before that I really got into exploring fullstack development and backend, so I wrote backend for some of my projects and had fun deploying them to Heroku and later to Render.

name: Streaming App
about: It is made with TypeScript that I started learning recently. You can login with a GitHub account, search for music, play it, and add songs to favourites (work in progress).
notes: I enjoy retrowave, synthwave, and electronic music, so I created a Streaming App project where you can listen to it.
